author: Chris Dancy
comment: I love the idea but it will not open on moto360. As soon as I place my watch on the charger it force closes. I didn't realize this until it was to late to get a refund. Please help.
title: Force closes

author: Phillip Reynolds
comment: Once the updated to Marshmallow it stopped working.  Hopefully the issue gets resolved because it worked well and I miss me night stand clock.
title: Does not work after updated

author: Tim Petrowitsch
comment: Doesn't work on latest wear version . Opens then. Rashes. Huawei watch stock. Also moto 360 doesn't work anymore.

author: Pawel Trojanowski
comment: Tried to contact customer service.  No answer.  Stay Away.
title: Stopped working after software update on Sony Smartwatch 3.

author: Rosanne Reynolds
comment: Since the watch software upgrade the software for the wear screen doesn't work.
title: Does not work with watch  update

author: Brian Kelly
title: Crashes with the new Moto 360 upgrade

author: joey bond
comment: This is very nice but would love it if the tempature was added or even a leather condition icon.

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: I'm going to add weather in future update. Thank you for review

title: Would love for you to add weather

author: jon winston
comment: Aww. Not working with wear 6.0.1 marshmallow for the moment.
title: Nice

author: Tyler Brockett
comment: Looks great, but as others have mentioned sometimes it doesn't rotate correctly. I can see the normal charge screen in the correct orientation for a split second before this loads, so its not a matter of the watch knowing which way it is. Will update my review when this is fixed. Thanks! Moto 360. Edit: also, now it doesn't activate all the time.
title: Sometimes doesn't rotate correctly

author: Will DeBerry
comment: Great app till it doesn't rotate the right way. Alarm stays in the same orientation like you are wearing the watch rather than rotating 90° for the dock. Was fine the first use. Also doesn't swap back to normal watch face once undocked.

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: Thank you for review, I'll check

title: Has potential

author: Joshua Smith
comment: Screen orientation is off on my Moto 360 which renders the purpose of the app moot. Will put at 5 stars when this is addressed.

reply.author: Stoneface
reply.content: I have fised it. What about now?

title: Screen orientation issues

author: Samuel Dipietro
comment: I really like this better than the regular charging screen (moto 360). I hope they will add some customization in the future.
title: New.. Great

author: Rick Michaelson
comment: Even though it's enabled, doesn't always activate when on charger and/or rotate screen. Moto360
title: Needs work

author: Rowan Scott
comment: I was hoping it had been fixed since these reviews... Nope
title: Crashes
